item.title: Hitchhiker's Guide to ELK Stack
item.description: ELK is a collection of opensource products Elasticsearch – Used Search and Analyze Logstash – Collects and transform logs Kibana – Visualize and Manage Logs All of the tools above are being maintained by Elastic. Elasticsearch is a NoSQL search engine, Logstash is a log pipeline that accepts input then transforms it using different filers and finally sends it to different targets. Kibana is a visualizer based on the elasticsearch.
